snippet: In other violence in Helmand Province, an Afghan government peace negotiator and two of his bodyguards were killed in an ambush, according to news reports.
abstract: Three British soldiers are killed by roadside bomb that detonates near them in Helmand Province, Afghanistan, deadliest attack on British soldiers there in a year; in other violence in Helmand Province, Afghan government peace negotiator and two of his bodyguards are killed in ambush.
lead_paragraph: In other violence in Helmand Province, an Afghan government peace negotiator and two of his bodyguards were killed in an ambush, according to news reports.

headline.seo: Roadside Bomb Kills 3 British Soldiers in Afghanistan
headline.main: Roadside Bomb Kills 3 British Soldiers on Patrol in Afghanistan
